radiographic_examinations.findings: Bilateral dependent atelectasis in the lung bases; inflammatory stranding/fluid surrounding the pancreas, most notably about the tail, consistent with pancreatitis; pancreas enhances homogeneously with no ductal dilatation or focal mass; no discrete fluid collection identified; normal liver size and density; gallbladder, adrenal glands, and kidneys within normal limits; no free air or lymphadenopathy; no suspicious lytic or sclerotic lesions.
